    • Method Detail

      • writeTestFiles

        public void writeTestFiles(java.io.File outDir,
                  java.io.File inDir,
                  Test test)
        Writes files to execute C tests. This includes a KAT file for each algorithm and for each library that is being tested Writes some static files common to all tests, as well as a makefile and a header file
        Parameters:
        outDir - top level tests directory. This method outputs files to directory/C_tests
        inDir - directory to read C_tests file from
        test - test cases to generate code for

      • hexToCUChar

        public static java.lang.String hexToCUChar(java.lang.String st)
        Parameters:
        st - Hex string with no spaces
        Returns:
        String containing a C array initializer to create an unsigned char equal to the value given by st
